name: Music_2419.wav
keywords: ['christmas music', 'romanian', 'male vocal', 'female vocal', 'festive singing', 'bass guitar', 'keyboard', 'sleigh bells', 'cheerful', 'joyful']
caption: This is a Christmas music piece. There is one male and one female vocalist singing in a festive manner in the Romanian language. There is a keyboard playing the melody and a bass guitar playing in the background. The rhythm is kept by the sleigh bells. The atmosphere is joyful. This piece could be playing in the background at a Christmas event in Romania.
